agreement_COD_STATE: select codeval2 codeval, codeval2 codetxt from {schema}.ucod2_country_state where codeval1='USA' and (codetdt is null or (codetdt is not null and codetdt > current_date)) order by codseq,codeval2
agreement_COD_MONTH: select {month_txt} as codeval,{month_txt} as codetxt from {schema}.v_months order by {month_val}
agreement_COD_YEAR: select {year_val} as codeval,{year_val} as codetxt from {schema}.v_years order by {year_val}
agreement_sign: update c set c_atstmp=current_date where c_id=@c_id;
with xrslt as (insert into {schema}.rqst(rqst_source, rqst_atype, rqst_aname, rqst_parms) values('CLIENT', 'REPORT', 'AGREEMENT',@rqst_parms) returning rqst_id)
insert into {schema}.rqst_d(rqst_id, d_scope, d_scope_id, d_ctgr, d_desc) select rqst_id, 'C',@c_id, 'AGREEMNT', 'Customer Portal Agreement' from xrslt;
agreement_paymentresult: select pacc_sts "pacc_sts",pacc_pp_result "pacc_pp_result",c_pre.c_id "c_id",c_pre.pe_id "pe_id",new_client_result "new_client_result",pe_ll_tstmp "pe_ll_tstmp" from c_pre left outer join {schema}.cpe on c_pre.pe_id=cpe.pe_id where c_pre_id=@payment_id and pacc_fp_hash=@fp_hash;
agreement_cod_c_id: select c_id as codeval,c_name as codetxt from c where 1=1 %%%DATALOCKS%%% order by c_name
agreement_report_N: select n.c_id "c_id",n_type "n_type",n_eu,to_char(n_etstmp,'MM/DD/YYYY') as n_etstmp,n_note from {schema}.n inner join c on c.c_id=n.c_id where n.c_id=@c_id %%%DATALOCKS%%%
